review_title: Social Worker, project Coordinator and Consultant in Projects, Social and Administrative issues
pros: Médecins du Monde in Cameroon works both on Medical issues and on Social Issues like Gender based violence. With the Anglophone crises the work is very timely and and impacting. The locals give a lot of esteem to MDM.
cons: They have very few staff thereby overworking the employed staff to attain the expected results.
